item.title: Federal Cuts Disrupt Local Justice Programs, but Communities Push Forward

item.title: Cuyahoga County Deputy Involved in Fatal Chases Accused of ‘Lying’ in Hiring Process
item.description: Deputy Kasey Loudermilk lied and kept details off his application about other police forces disqualifying him, according to his personnel file.
